metadata.title: AIverse - Enhanced AI Tools Dataset
metadata.description: A comprehensive, curated collection of 1,000 high-quality AI tools focused on user-facing products
enhancement_criteria: Removed GitHub repositories and developer-focused tools
Prioritized tools with dedicated product websites
Focused on commercial and consumer-ready applications
Sorted by popularity and user ratings
